topic: Transfer of Bonus Points for Exam Retake

correspondence.message: I would like to know if I can transfer my bonus points to the retake exam for the EIST course since I was unable to attend the Endterm exam due to illness. I have already reached out to the tutors and another department but haven't received a response. I can provide a doctor's note if needed."
You can use your bonus points for the retake exam since you were ill during the original exam. However, this is a decision for the examiner, so please follow up with them again.
